title: How to Help and Donate to Wildfire Victims in Hawaii
description: From the Hawaii Community Foundation to the Maui Food Bank, donations to these groups aid people impacted by the recent disaster in Lahaina.

title: The World Isn’t Ready for the Next Decade of AI
description: Mustafa Suleyman, cofounder of DeepMind and Inflection AI, talks about how AI and other technologies will take over everything—and possibly threaten the very structure of the nation-state.

title: How Amazon’s In-House First Aid Clinics Push Injured Employees to Keep Working
description: A WIRED investigation and federal citations show how first aid clinics in Amazon warehouses sometimes direct injured employees to get back on the job, risking further injury.
